af_prt.description: AppsFlyer proprietary ranking for measuring partner performance

media_source.description: Source of the media where the campaign was promoted

campaign.description: Name or ID of the advertising campaign

impressions.description: Total number of times an ad was displayed

clicks.description: Total number of clicks on the campaign link

click_through_rate.description: Percentage of clicks that result in a specific action, usually a conversion

conversion_rate.description: Percentage of users who take a desired action after engaging with the campaign

sessions.description: Total number of sessions or interactions users have with the app

loyal_users.description: Number of users who continuously engage with the app over time

loyal_users_rate.description: Percentage of users classified as loyal users

total_revenue.description: Total revenue generated from the campaign

total_cost.description: Total cost incurred for running the campaign

return_on_investment.description: Measure of revenue generated compared to the total cost of the campaign

average_ecpi.description: Average cost per install for the campaign

account_login_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who have logged into their accounts

account_login_sales.description: Total sales generated from account logins

af_complete_registration_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who have completed the registration process

af_complete_registration_event_counter.description: Total number of completed registration events tracked by AppsFlyer

af_complete_registration_sales.description: Total sales generated from completed registrations

af_purchase_registration_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who made a purchase after registration

af_purchase_registration_event_counter.description: Total number of purchase registration events recorded

af_purchase_registration_sales.description: Total sales generated from purchase registrations

checkout_success_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who completed a successful checkout

checkout_success_event_counter.description: Total number of successful checkout events

checkout_success_sales.description: Total sales generated from successful checkouts

create_product_complete_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who have completed creating a product

create_product_complete_event_counter.description: Total number of completed product creation events

create_product_complete_sales.description: Total sales generated from completed product creations

init_appsflyer_id_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who have initialized Appsflyer IDs

init_appsflyer_id_event_counter.description: Total number of Appsflyer ID initialization events

init_appsflyer_id_sales.description: Total sales generated from Appsflyer ID initialization

pay_premium_pkg_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who have purchased the premium package

pay_premium_pkg_event_counter.description: Total number of premium package purchases events

pay_premium_pkg_sales.description: Total sales generated from premium package purchases
